doc.after: The main terminal building is 396 metres (1,299Â ft) long, 176 metres (577Â ft) wide and 40 metres (130Â ft) tall.[21] It is the largest building in the Terminal 5 complex and is the largest free-standing building in the United Kingdom. Its four stories are covered by a single-span undulating steel frame roof, with glass faÃ§ades angled at 6.5 degrees to the vertical. The area covered by the roof is the size of five football pitches, and each section weighs 2,200 tonnes.
